body:
As some of you may know I was recently perm banned from Avicus. I would like to inform you that I will be staying with the community even though I will not be a player on the server. I will be giving ideas and input on things and am not a bad sport for getting banned.
          -PD
body_tagged:

          -PD
title: Not Farewell!

replies.body:
Hey PocketsDude, I really feel bad for you. Looking at your past infractions, I believe you could easily appeal if you do not abuse the public chat since most of your infractions are because of that. 

I suggest that you appeal at the end of the month and then by then, maybe you would have learned your lesson. Good luck and thanks for being a good sport!
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
Hey Pockets.

Although you want to inform the community that you will be staying, posts like these are unfortunately not allowed on the forums, according to Section D, Number 7.

If you want to help out the community, your ban may be easier to appeal, although excessive infractions is not the easiest punishment to appeal.
However, it is not impossible.

Good luck!
